title: Save the Grymforge Gnomes
content: f you helped Thulla previously, you can tell her she sent you. You will learn about Philomeen, (You can also learn about her from Brithvar, but not her name), running away with smokepowder If you manage to convince Lunkbug to talk, he tells you about Philomeen's escape and points her possible location on your map.
